TEXT.TITLE: FOXBORO CO <FOX> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr loss one ct vs loss 2.65 dlrs Oper net loss 100,000 vs loss 32.7 mln Revs 142.3 mln vs 168.8 mln 12 mths Oper shr profit 57 cts vs loss 2.76 dlrs Oper net profit 7,072,000 vs loss 34.2 mln Revs 544.0 mln vs 572.2 mln Note: 1986 oper net excludes tax credits of 2,149,000 dlrs for qtr and 2,200,000 dlrs for 12 mths. Includes restructuring charges of 120 mln dlrs for qtr, 527 mln dlrs for 12 mths. Reuter
